inclusion.criterion: Anti-HCV (Abbott HCV EIA 2.0, Abbott Diagnostic, Chicago, IL) positive > 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Detectable serum quantitative HCV-RNA (Cobas Taqman v2.0, Roche Diagnostics) with HCV
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A liver biopsy consistent with the diagnosis of chronic hepatitis C
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Anemia (hemoglobin < 13 gram per deciliter for men and < 12 gram per deciliter for women)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Co-infection with hepatitis B virus (HBV) or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic alcohol abuse (daily consumption > 20 gram per day)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated liver disease (Child-Pugh class B or C)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine level more than 1.5 times the upper limit of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV.
